Name: Fight Party
About the game: Discord Community Server Whether it’s playing around or having a full-on competition, Fight party’s random map generation and weapons allows for a new battle to occur every round. Have a refreshed experience every round or pick and choose between what weapons you’d like to spawn. However there can only be one winner. 2 - 8 player split-screen multiplayer Random items Themed levels Random level generation with varying sizes Themed sudden death for each map Basic fighting combo system Throwable hazard ball that generates a random event
Meta Title: Fight Party: May 15, 2021, Mr. Vibin and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fight Party? Check out the release date (May 15, 2021), developer insights from Mr. Vibin, and a complete game summary.
